text:
Hi everyone

*Issue: Custom Calling App Not Visible to HubSpot within the Organization Paid Seat Users*
*Details and Steps Followed:*
1. Created a HubSpot developer account.
2. Developed a custom app within the developer account.
3. Built and hosted the Calling Extensions SDK using React.
4. Tested the demo calling app by:
    ◦ Setting values in local storage.
    ◦ Updating HubSpot settings to point to the local calling app.
    ◦ Testing it successfully within HubSpot.
5. Migrated the calling app to a cloud-hosted environment and updated HubSpot settings accordingly.
6. Set the app for production use by running the PATCH API.
*Issue:*
 Despite completing the above steps, the custom calling app is not visible under the call options on the contacts for HubSpot internal users.
*Reference:*
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/guides/api/crm/extensions/calling-sdk#using-the-calling-settings-endpoint|HubSpot Developers Guide - Calling SDK>
Looking forward to any insights or solutions from the community!

<#C2YGWHDKQ|marketplace>

Hello guys how are you doing ?
I need help to create a plugin on HubSpot to connect other API's platforms like MercadoLibre and FincaRaiz real estate platform
Do you see the app under the connected apps page in settings?
Yes I do see it under connected apps
